item.title: QEMU-CXL
item.author: Cyan
item.description: 1 qemu-img create -f qcow2 drive 16G 1 qemu-system-x86_64 -machine q35 -smp sockets=1,cores=4,threads=4 -m 4096 -usb -device usb-kbd -device usb-tablet -rtc base=localtime -net nic,model=virtio -drive file=drive,media=disk,if=virtio -drive file=ubuntu-22.04.2-live-server-amd64.iso,media=cdrom qemu-system-x86_64 -machine q35 -smp sockets=1,cores=4,threads=4 -m 4096 -usb -device usb-kbd -device usb-tablet -rtc base=localtime -net nic,model=virtio -drive file=drive,media=disk,if=virtio -drive file=ubuntu-22.04.2-live-server-amd64.iso,media=cdrom -object memory-backend-file,id=cxl-mem1,share=on,mem-path=/tmp/cxltest.raw,size=256M -object memory-backend-file,id=cxl-lsa1,share=on,mem-path=/tmp/lsa.raw,size=256M -device pxb-cxl,bus_nr=12,bus=pcie.0,id=cxl.1 -device cxl-rp,port=0,bus=cxl.1,id=root_port13,chassis=0,slot=2 -device cxl-type3,bus=root_port13,persistent-memdev=cxl-mem1,lsa=cxl-lsa1,id=cxl-pmem0 -M cxl-fmw.0.targets.0=cxl.1,cxl-fmw.0.size=4G 1 2 3 4 5 6 -object memory-backend-file,id=cxl-mem1,share=on,mem-path=/tmp/cxltest.raw,size=256M \ -object memory-backend-file,id=cxl-lsa1,share=on,mem-path=/tmp/lsa.
